subject: Re: Websites
preview: Thanks so much Heath, appreciated.  Hope you guys are all doing well at the moment, chat soon.  Thanks,  Nichole  Nichole Valk  m: 0425 699 660  e: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au | w: avisogroup.com.au  p: P

full_threads.body:
Thanks so much Heath, appreciated.

Hope you guys are all doing well at the moment, chat soon.

Thanks,

Nichole

Nichole Valk

m: 0425 699 660

e: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au | w: avisogroup.com.au

p: PO Box 99, Caringbah NSW 1495

Hi Nichole, 

Thanks for your patience with this.

Confirming we have made the below updates.

Regarding the footer, it's hard coded, hence why some of your changes won't work. We can do them for you if you like.

Thanks for this Heath, hope you’re keeping well.

If I could please ask for a few central updates on this one it would be much appreciated:

Sutton logo throughout (uploaded in media)
Find & replace all reference to word ‘Allsafe’ to ‘Sutton’
+ update links with prefix Allsafe.com.au <http://allsafe.com.au/> to suttoninsurnace.com.au <http://suttoninsurnace.com.au/>

Update phone number & email throughout every page ‘global footer’:
(02) 6722 4300
admin@suttoninsurance.com.au <mailto:admin@suttoninsurance.com.au>
Link header phone and email to click to call/click to email
Reduce size (or move more to left) of top email address running over the button

I’ll need to modify the bottom footer later as well – however the ‘theme editor’ of the footer.php file from the dashboard still doesn’t work to save out any changes (it used to, so not sure why across all brokers now). If there is any fix you can resolve so I can make the edits great, otherwise I’ll just let you know what needs changing in this section once I can confirm soon ☺


Thanks,
Nichole

Nichole Valk
m: 0425 699 660
e: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au <mailto:nvalk@avisogroup.com.au> | w: avisogroup.com.au <http://avisogroup.com.au/>
p: PO Box 99, Caringbah NSW 1495

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>>
Date: Friday, 13 March 2020 at 12:40 pm
To: Nichole Valk <nvalk@avisogroup.com.au <mailto:nvalk@avisogroup.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Websites

Hi Nichole,

Great news the Sutton Insurance staging site is ready for you: https://suttoninsurance.wpperk.cloud/ <https://suttoninsurance.wpperk.cloud/>

Let me know if you need anything else at this stage?

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wpperk.com/>


On 12 Mar 2020, at 2:55 pm, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>> wrote:

Hi Nichole,

Sure, sounds good we will spin that up for you today (the rate is fine too of course).

And yes, we can have a chat, no problems, here is my calendar to book in: https://calendly.com/heathmaguire/30min <https://calendly.com/heathmaguire/30min>

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


<https://wpperk.com/>


On 12 Mar 2020, at 1:59 pm, Nichole Valk <nvalk@avisogroup.com.au <mailto:nvalk@avisogroup.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Once we’ve completed the Insurance Aid website switch first, can you please also setup in the background a copy of the Allsafe website for our new broker build Sutton Insurance Brokers. Existing website/domain is: https://suttoninsurance.com.au/ <https://suttoninsurance.com.au/> to prep. I’d like to get started on re-branding this one now in the background and finalise it with Matt (Director) asap, after which I’ll get him to sign up to go live when ready. Thanks!

P.s I’ve mentioned to brokers that Aviso have a deal (which they love) @ 99.pmth so hopefully you’re ok to keep this for our sites/Aviso ongoing? I know the process to finalise all brokers is taking ages sorry, but we’ll get there!

Also, can we tee up a very quick discussion in the coming weeks around once the websites are hosted together, whether there are any opportunities to centralise anything or create efficiencies? & any recommendations you may have around this i.e if we did one blog post we could push to all etc.. SEO work.. etc

Cheers,
Nichole


<image001.png>
Nichole Valk
Brand & Project Manager

m: 0425 699 660
e: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au <mailto:nvalk@avisogroup.com.au> | w: avisogroup.com.au <http://avisogroup.com.au/>
